data.text: “You people of Israel, I brought all your ancestors out of Egypt;
From all the people-groups on the earth,
Two people certainly cannot [RHQ] walk together
A lion certainly does not [RHQ] roar in the bushes/forest
No one can [RHQ] catch a bird
Similarly, all the people in a city certainly [RHQ] become afraid
And whatever Yahweh plans to do,
Everyone certainly becomes terrified [RHQ] when they hear a lion roar,
I said this to the leaders of Samaria (OR, Yahweh said this to me):
Yahweh says that the people there do not know how to do things that are right.
So Yahweh our God says that soon their enemies will come
The Commander of the armies of angels said this:
When I, Yahweh, punish the people of Israel
I will cause the houses that they live in during the ◄winter/rainy season► and those in which they live during the ◄summer/dry season► to be torn down.
